name: 5-3-2 Cluster Method (~10 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: Each 5-3-2 sequence ~1 min + 2 min rest => ~9-10 min total for 3 sets
overview_and_execution: With ~85% 1RM, do 5 reps, rest 20s, 3 reps, rest 20s, then 2 reps. Rest 2â€“3 min, repeat for 3 total clusters. Increase weight once all reps are comfortably completed.
example_application: Deadlift @ 300 lbs: 5 reps, rest 20s, 3 reps, rest 20s, 2 reps. After 2 min rest, do 2 more sets of this pattern. If you succeed, add 5 lbs next session.
important_notes: Short intra-set rests allow high-intensity reps without full fatigue. Good for strength building.
